Title: Strapless Satin Ball Gown

Category: formal-gowns

Featured-image: CJ213-red-strapless-satin-ball-gown_p.jpg

----

Description: A satin prom gown with a sweetheart neckline and strapless silhouette are classical and ready for any evening event. The sweetheart neckline has a small plunge that is layered with a sheer fabric. The back of the bodice is a tie up corset look. The belt at the waistline is pleated and completes the look.
